summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the Helm of Yngol
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=blue]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive-release[/b], 
 please respect my decision and 
[b]DO NOT reupload it elsewhere...[/b]. 
I did not give, or want to give permission for any kind of reupload.


High-resolution texture replacer for the Helm of Yngol. Everything has been redone from scratch.
Both maps are 2048x2048, and a 1k version will be soon be added as an optional file.
This retexture will be added to the Book of Silence with the next update.



Big thanks to the authors of the video reviews, please like and subscribe to them.


[center][youtube]EuQuTrzTvFY[/youtube][youtube]b6ZIne1X56g[/youtube][youtube]-CH5naKe6ow[/youtube][youtube]7Hl_xmU3o_M[/youtube][/center]
 

also a huge thank to 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1159455]faeriexdecay[/url]
and 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=351527]TomAraya[/url]
for the awesome,incredible,extremely appreciated ingame screenshots...true masterpieces :)



[b]my  mods:[/b] (click on the images)
[center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909][IMG]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Book_ButtonKopie_zps9592ba19.png[/IMG][/url]


[/center]


enjoy
author: CaBaL
